Integrate with Contextual AI to automate: 与 Contextual AI 整合以实现文档处理和AI 工作流
Your Contextual AI API key: 您的上下文AI API 密钥
API base URL (leave blank for default): API 基础 URL (留空为默认值)
\n## Contextual AI Connection Setup\n\n#:
## Contextual AI Connection Setup

### Prerequisites
- Create a Contextual AI account at [Contextual AI](https://contextual.ai)
- Generate an API key from your workspace settings
- You'll receive $25 in free credits (or $50 with work email)

### Authentication Fields

**API Key**: Your Contextual AI API key (required)
- Sign in to your Contextual AI workspace
- Navigate to API Keys in the sidebar
- Click "Create API Key" and follow the instructions
- Copy the generated key and paste it here

**Base URL**: The API base URL (optional)
- Leave blank to use the default: `https://api.contextual.ai/v1`
- Only change if you have a custom deployment
Send a message to a Contextual AI agent: 向上下文的AI 代理发送消息并获得响应
Generate text using Contextual AI's Grou: 使用上下文AI的地面语言模型生成文本
Upload and ingest a document into a Cont: 上传和录制文档到 Contextual AI 数据存储
Parse a document file into structured Ma: 将文档文件解析为结构化的 Markdown 或 JSON 格式
Create a new Contextual AI agent with sp: 创建具有指定配置的新上下文AI 代理
Invite new users to the Contextual AI wo: 邀请新用户到上下文AI工作区
Create a new datastore for organizing do: 为组织文档创建一个新的数据存储
Optional conversation ID to continue an: 可选对话 ID 继续现有对话 (留空为新对话)
Include the text of retrieved contents i: 在响应中包含已检索内容的文本
The version of Contextual's GLM to use: 要使用的 Contextual GLM 版本
Optional knowledge sources to ground the: 生成的可选知识来源(留空为普通代)
Maximum number of tokens to generate (de: 要生成的最大令牌数量 (默认： 1024)
Sampling temperature (0.0 to 1.0, lower: 采样温度(0.0 到 1.0, 低 = 重点更加突出，高 = 更具创造性)
Avoid providing additional conversationa: 避免提供不以上下文为基础的额外对话注释
Select the datastore to upload the docum: 选择要上传文档到的数据存储
The document file to upload (PDF, HTML,: 要上传的文档文件 (PDF, HTML, DOC, DOCX, PPT, PPTX)
Optional custom metadata as key-value pa: 可选的自定义元数据作为键值对值 (最多15个字段，2KB 总计)
Optional configuration override in JSON: 此特定文档的 JSON 格式的可选配置
The document file to parse (PDF, DOC, DO: 要解析的文档文件 (PDF, DOC, DOCX, PPT, PPTX)
Parsing mode - basic for simple text, st: 解析模式-简单文本的基本文本，复杂文件的标准
Optional page range to parse (e.g., \"0,: 解析的可选页面范围 (例如"0,1,2" 或 "0-2,5,6")
Add table of contents with document stru: 添加带有文档结构的目录表(teta功能)
Split large tables into multiple tables: 将大表格拆分成多个带标题的表格
Threshold for splitting large tables (on: 拆分大表格的阈值 (只有当启用拆分表时才使用)
How thorough figure captions should be: 图形标题应该是多么透彻的
Select datastores to associate with this: 选择要与此代理关联的数据存储(留空以创建新的数据存储)
Optional system prompt for the agent: 对代理人可选的系统提示
Optional prompt for filtering retrieved: 可选的过滤已检索到的块的提示
The short name of the tenant/workspace: 租户/工作区的简短名称
Triggers when a new Contextual AI agent: 创建新的上下文AI 代理时触发
